name: Slime Farmer (itch) (codeprincess)
description:
Slime Farmer is a Farming Game where instead of doing all of the farming yourself, you have slime friends to help you! Currently there is only a Blue Slime who helps water.

How To Play:

- You need to lead the slime onto the plots to water them before you can plant.

- Open/Close your inventory by pressing E on your keyboard.

- To buy crops, open the Shop Menu from your Inventory and click on what seed you want. It will appear on the left with a price below. Click on the seed pack to get it.

- Click on the Hotbar at the bottom of the screen to select which seed you would like to plant.

- Walk onto a wet tile patch and press spacebar while you have the seeds selected. Pressing spacebar on a planted seed will also harvest/delete the crop planted.

- Once you have planted the seeds, water them with your slime and Sleep. This can be done in the Inventory.

- Continue to water and sleep until crops are grown. Harvest by pressing the spacebar.

- To sell crops, click on their Icon in your Inventory.

- Your slime has hunger, meaning you will need to feed it. If you don't, it will get slower and slower. To feed it, you need strawberries (you start off with 3) and you click on the Strawberry Icon at the top left of your screen.

Created by codeprincess, Ben Miller and Cory Arnett-O'Brien.
